Army color guard posed with flags and rifles
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Exterior view of four soldiers, two are holding flags, two are holding rifles
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Flags; Flag bearers; Military parades and ceremonies; Military uniforms; Rifles; Soldiers

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal of June 14, 1945. H. O. Hite, Jr. bears the U. S. Flag; Tilden Batchelder bears the Corps of Engineer flag.
